mapper.insert: INSERT INTO order_detail(ORDER_DETAIL_ID, ORDER_ID, MENU_ID, MEMBER_ID, AMOUNT, TUMBLER, SHOT, VANILLA_SYRUP, CREAM) VALUES(#{orderDetailId}, #{orderId}, #{menuId}, #{memberId}, #{amount}, #{tumbler}, #{shot}, #{vanillaSyrup}, #{cream} )
mapper.select: SELECT MENU_NAME AS menuName, MENU_IMG AS menuImg, MENU_PRICE AS menuPrice, MENU_DEFINITION AS menuDefinition FROM MENU WHERE MENU_ID=#{menuId}
